title.narrative: Improving the well-being of older people, their families and communities

description.narrative: 1. Older people at the grassroots level are empowered to help themselves tackle issues of concern to them and their communities through a widened network of multifunctional community-led organisations in seven countries in East Asia.

The suffering of impoverished older people is relieved and their dignity affirmed through increased income at the grassroots level as a result of improved social pension policy and practice in the East Asian region.
To improve the wellbeing of older people and their communities across countries in Asia by means of researches, studies, partners identifying and applying the best approaches
